entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Simplify handling of RMW intrinsics in LSRA #104842
    9.0.0
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Simplify `emitIns_Mov` code when emitting RMW intrinsics #104841
    9.0.0
  • mono is failing to build on arm64 macOS #104839
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - In the importer, always `ConvertToMask` on SVE APIs that require a mask. #104836
    9.0.0
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Fix alphabetical order of APIs #104834
    9.0.0
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Remove newlines in `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.cs` #104833
    9.0.0
  • [8.0][browser][wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.MiscTests3.WithDllImportInMainAssembly test timeout (30000ms exceeded) #104830
  • [8.0][browser][wasm] emcc failure to compile aot-instances #104827
  • [8.0][browser][wasm] Failed trying to read log messages via selenium: OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverException: An unknown exception was encountered sending an HTTP request to the remote WebDriver server for URL #104825
  • [6.0] Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.Tests failing to access a symlink used by PhysicalFilesWatcher #104823
  • ICorDebugRegisterSet.GetThreadContext fails on macOS arm64 #104816
    9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Missing test coverage for invalid immediate #104809
  • [API Proposal]: ReadOnlySpan<char> overload for WebUtility.HtmlEncode. #104808
  • WPF control is not reclaimed on NET9 by GC #104807
  • ARM64-SVE: Separate operand and mask generation in test templates #104804
    Future
  • [WASI] fix event loop init #104803
    9.0.0
  • LoggerMessage generator fails with primary constructor logger, if the logger is used elsewhere #104801
    9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Turn on "V" in zlib-ng compilation #104799
    Future
  • RFE: Add support for using system version of the llvm-libunwind library #104796
    Future
  • RFE: Add support for using system version of the LinuxTracepoints library #104795
    Future
  • Setup cleanup task on jit-format workflow #104794
  • [browser] Trigger relink on `EmccMaximumHeapSize` change #104790
    9.0.0
  • Cross compilation not working on ARM64 machines #104788
  • [WASI][Mono AOT] System.Collections.Specialized.Tests #104786
    9.0.0
  • System.Security.Principal.Windows 4.7.0 package too large #104785
  • Irregular tag name of version v9.0.0-preview.6.24327.7 #104784
  • [H/3] Distributed Tracing / Telemetry #104783
    10.0.0
  • 'openssl/engine.h' not found on RHEL10 #104775
  • [wasi] upgrade to WASI SDK 23 #104773
    10.0.0
  • javascript calling a method with return Task type in .net 9.0 preview6, the returned promise is always in pending state #104772
  • Test failure: System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStartInfoTests.StartInfo_BadExe(useShellExecute: False) #104770
  • Improve AppHost to display the startup exceptions (such as assembly dependency error) #104768

Closed

  • Obsoletions with a DiagnosticId still get warnings in generated code #101738
    10.0.0
  • Linker doesn't trim substituted `static readonly` fields when consumed directly #82821
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandlerFunctional.Tests.BidirectionStreamingTest.BackwardsCompatibility_DowngradeToHttp11 #103754
    9.0.0
  • aspnet app crash with core dump when using 7.0.11-bookworm-slim docker image (debian 12) #93205
    Future
  • ILLink handling of `Type.GetType` doesn't resolve types from corelib #103906
    9.0.0
  • Type.GetType("TypeName") will pick the "first" such type found #98955
    9.0.0
  • Dotnet Android broken debugging (and runtime?) #104265
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json serialization callbacks not supported by collection types #71945
    Future
  • Socket.ConnectAsync(EndPoint, CT) does not pass CT to DNS query, enabling code with many concurrent connections to the same DNS name to reach a state where no further connections get established because all DNS queries time out #92054
    9.0.0
  • Error in blazor 8 intective auto mode #104814
  • F# program fails with an unprintable exception when `FSharp.Core` is not referenced. #104528
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PingTest.CancelSendPingAsync fails on osx.1200.amd64.open #104574
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandlerFunctional.Tests.WinHttpHandlerTest.SendAsync_SlowServerRespondsAfterDefaultReceiveTimeout_ThrowsHttpRequestException #96481
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamTlsResumeTests failing #103354
    9.0.0
  • tracing/eventpipe/providervalidation/providervalidation/providervalidation.cmd test failure #101759
    9.0.0
  • SSL Stress Connection Refused Linux #93204
    9.0.0
  • GC root enumerating crashing with BULK_WRITEBARRIER helper on the stack #101890
    9.0.0
  • DotNet MAUI with .Net 7 fails to open Websocket in Android Foreground Service #93226
  • nativeruntimeeventsource test fails due to missing metadata #90021
    9.0.0
  • DisableBitTests.EnabledThroughFeatureSwitch/DisabledAlwaysInBrowser failures #103683
  • Random SIGSEGVs after porting from Xamarin to net8-android #98933
  • Test failure: System.Net.NameResolution.Tests.MetricsTest.DurationHistogram_HasBucketSizeHints #104769
  • JIT: Optimize "x == a && y == b" #104767
  • JIT doesn't allow method prologues to have more than one instruction group #104585
    9.0.0
  • HTTP/2 request doesn't report the correct reason why request ends on connection GOAWAY #97128
    9.0.0
  • Mono does not emit ProcessExit event on SIGTERM. #81093
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.WebAssembly.Pack #103429

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix WinHttp StreamingTest backward compat version #104838
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix WinHttp StreamingTest backward compat version #104837
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • add support of TLS 1.3 on macOS POC #104835
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x
  • [cdac] Update thread contract doc to align with implementation and other contract docs #104832
    needs-area-label
  • Ensure `ISimdVector` default implementations perform nullcheck #104831
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Don't dispose timers if we're in our UnhandledException handler. #104829
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.Caching
  • Don't dispose timers if we're in our UnhandledException handler. #104828
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.Caching, 8.0.x
  • Remove implicit flush from BufferedStream.WriteByte #104822
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Throw ObjectDisposedException instead of NullReferenceException #104821
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix SSP restoring in edge cases #104820
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: defer creating throw helper code until we know it's needed #104819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Get ThreadContext for AVX registers #104818
    Servicing-consider, area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Fix a nested-externs warning in mono #104817
    area-Tracing-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid boxing ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull arguments in Tier-0 #104815
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add DebuggerDisableUserUnhandledExceptionsAttribute #104813
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [cdac] Begin adding MethodDesc APIs to the RuntimeTypeSystem contract #104811
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Make OpenSSL ENGINE support light up #104810
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] Remove "nuget.org" references in WBT #104806
    Security, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • fix warnings in coreclr/jit/compiler.cpp for non-Windows targets #104805
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid strength reducing IVs that are live out of a loop #104800
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't use SyncTextWriter on WASI either #104798
    area-System.IO, os-wasi
  • [HTTP/3] Add null check in case we can't get H/3 inboundControlStream #104797
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [browser] Extension agnostic lazy assembly loading #104793
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Add a buffer to `FileWriter` and add a `--parallelism` option to superpmi.py #104789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend usage of GC_ALLOC_ALIGN8 #104781
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove GTF_BOOLEAN #104779
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable fixed disabled System.Text.Json tests #104771
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution

Merged

  • [RISC-V] Turn off "V" in zlib-ng compilation #104776
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • STJ: Support serialization callbacks for collection and dictionary types #104120
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [mono] Skip exact interface matches when an interface has variance #103757
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Make build.ps1 default to the OS architecture #104792
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] [LibraryImportGenerator] Use basic forwarder in down-level support if any parameters can't be marshalled #104501
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.8
  • [release/8.0 staging] Port fix for 103477 to 8.0 #103918
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.8
  • Fix WinHttp StreamingTest backward compat Version #104722
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Remove FEATURE_SET_FLAGS, clean up arm32 flags #104778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix type parsing issues in ILLink and ILC #104060
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #104330
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Fix cancelability of DNS queries #104420
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Document arm `PreferredMachine` settings #104812
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix zlib-ng build failure caught in the sdk CI #104750
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ignore type resolution failures when checking for attributes in `StackTrace.ToString`. #104530
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add missing cancellation throw in SendPingAsync path #104780
    area-System.Net
  • Turn off USE_REGIONS for sunos and illumos #104301
    area-GC-coreclr, area-PAL-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Fix WinHttp SlowServerRespondsAfterDefaultReceiveTimeout_ThrowsHttpRequestException #104774
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Clean up procfs.h mess on sunos and illumos #104304
    area-PAL-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • [browser] fix minification #104787
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `FloatingPointExponentialAccelerator` #104649
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Replace Ubuntu 18 images with Ubuntu 20 in ARM 64 runs #104689
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix issue link for an expected difference in warning behavior #104760
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Uncomment disabled test that has been fixed #104764
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update downlevel Versions.props #104685
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Bump the stj version to avoid error #104751
    area-Build-mono
  • [Wasi] switch to preview 2 #104683
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Enable DiagnosticsTest for HTTP3 #104641
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Ensure mono wasm jiterpreter handles v128_bitcast #104698
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Refine post-dominance check in strength reduction #104687
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Some more cleanup to regex NonBacktracking #104766
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/6.0] Disable SslStress and HttpStress runs #104714
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters: fix target framework check for source-build. #104735
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/2] Throw meaningful exception if we get GOAWAY while reading response body #104707
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [Apple-Mobile][Globalization] Refactoring of CalendarData.iOS and new DateTimeFormatInfo* tests #102464
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.0
  • Delete FEATURE_READYTORUN_COMPILER ifdef #104727
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ISOSDACInterface::GetThreadData reading the GC alloc context. #104762
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • Add runtime metrics in `System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource` #104680
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Decompose some bitwise operations in HIR to allow more overall optimizations to kick in #104517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adds `SpanSplitEnumerator` #104534
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • cDac work necessary to get the MethodTableName #104759
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2493882 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • JIT: Added Sve.CreateBreakPropagateMask #104704
    arch-arm64, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • JIT: Straighten out flow during early jump threading #104603
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `TrigonometricMultiplyAddCoefficient` #104697
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • JIT: Unify LSRA call arg building #104051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Prove some cases where strength reducing to GC pointers is ok #104679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Sve.ScatterXBitYNarrowing() on Arm64 #104720
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeout for tracing/eventcounter/runtimecounters #104461
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • HTTP Metrics: Uncoditionally report server.port #104741
    area-System.Net.Http, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Remove MONO ifdef from Vector128 bitcasts #104694
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #104395
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #103267
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #104565
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95853
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.x
  • Fix PHI non-null pattern #104493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Backport fix for MethodImpl removal when interfaceImpl is removed #103432
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.x
  • [nomerge] [GC] Add verification and logging to region_free_list #104061
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] use also SslCertificateTrust when constructing CertificateContext #104541
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add libicu74 as a known ICU version #104755
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • [release/6.0-staging] Add libicu74 as a known ICU version #104756
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `TrigonometricSelectCoefficient`, `TrigonometricStartingValue` #104681
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Don't warn for reflection access to compiler-generated code #104757
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [browser] tests and fixes for heap larger than 2GB #104662
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Enable embedding install location options in apphost #104749
    area-Host
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics for work in .NET 10 #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] When reconciling shadow stack after catch, look for RhpThrowHwEx2 as well. #104652
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Have mono handle the vector as APIs that grow or shrink the vector type #104445
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `AddSequentialAcross` #104640
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `ConvertToSingle`, `ConvertToDouble`; fix `CovertTo*` tests #104478
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Activities for Http Connections, Dns, Sockets and SslStream #103922
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Testing OOM in System.Buffers.Tests #104734
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Caching: migrate HybridCache api surface from asp.net into runtime #103103
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Android] Improve SslStream PAL buffer resizing #104726
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Expose `JsonElement.DeepEquals` #104579
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Ensure that the correct VC++ toolset is selected in all build environments #104763
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasi] wasi:http + WasiHttpHandler #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Don't make web requests in HttpClient trimming test #104718
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • ILLink: Rebuild override info after custom step runs #104566
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • ILLink: Fix order dependent logic for DAM on types #104701
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix trim warnings for base method implementing interface #104753
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add support for `SwiftSelf<T>` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104171
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Enable "Allocate on stack" for NAOT/R2R #104411
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Transform multi-reg args to FIELD_LIST in physical promotion #104370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] [swift-interop] Add support for reverse pinvoke argument lowering #104437
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift struct lowering in direct P/Invoke returns #104389
    arch-arm64, arch-x64, area-Codegen-meta-mono, 9.0.0

    area-System.Threading

    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, arch-riscv

  • Windows CNG virtualization-based security #102495
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
